𓅣 ⋍ 𓅥 heron, egret, stork

𒆠𒊕𒊩 igira₂ egret > heron 𒆠𒅗𒊩 igiraₓ egret > heron 𒄿𒄀𒊒 i-gi-ru™ egret “heron”
𒄿𒄀𒊏𒄷 i-gi-ra #igirû mušen "heron, stork" 𒉌𒄄𒊏𒄷 i₃-gi4-ra igira egret "heron" ≠ negro

stork

𓋴 𓂧 𓄿 𓅥 𓏤 | egret | stârc alb

𒍝𒊏𒄴𒄷 za-ra-aḫ zarah mušen "stork, heron" 𒍝𒊏𒄴𒄷 /Tsarch/ Storch ≈ stork штрк щъ́ркел štǎ́rkel տառեղն taṙełn

longleg

𒍝𒊏𒄴𒄷 ≈ 𒀀𒊩𒄷 #laqlaqqu "longleg" (ГГ = NG) لَقْلَق laqlaq लकलक laklak 𓃀 𓅣 λελέκι leléki "stork" 𒀀𒊩𒄷 bu₄sal бу́сел búsjel <> баця́н bocian 𓃀 𓈖 𓅣 <> 𒀀𒊩 birth 𒊩

phoenix

𓃀 𓈖 𓅣 | Venus | ≈ phoenix Venus is normally called either “the phoenix bird” or “the heron bird”

𓃀 𓈖 𓅣 | Venus | 𜎯𜐪𜏌𜏵 Pinikir Phain'egret 𒀭𒈹 ( 𒀭𒀭 Anu < Φαίνων ♃ ) vs Meregret

𓃀 𓈖 𓏌 𓅱 𓅣 | Benu bird | phoenix / heron

G31 𓅣 ⋍ 𓅥 BenHuron Phøn 𓅣 Bennu heron G32 𓅤 G33 𓅥 ≠ pan𓄅

𓏏 𓏐 𓅝 | •stork | ⇔ starch Stärke ⇔ science scrit ⇔ 𓃻 sit?
